1.For security reason, we will manually review your withdrawal and proceed ASAP.\n2.To speed up the transfer we will pay for the network fee each time. But due to the network uncertainty, some transactions may take longer, please be patient.\n3.The handling fee for withdrawal is the %s%% of each transaction.
Please enter wallet address or scan
You haven\'t link a email. Please link a email, you can recover the forgotten password through email.
You haven\'t link a mobile number. Please link a mobile number, you can recover the forgotten password through mobile.
Please enter your verified ID number
Please enter the correct verify code to reset password
For account safety, please choose a verification method.
Transaction password can be used for all applications within the ecosystem. If you have reset the transaction password in any eco-application the passwords will be different.

1、The ID photo must be clear and the ID number is readable; 
2、Requires bareheaded photo without make up；
3、Photo cannot be modified；
4、Fingers cannot cover the information of the ID.

1. The transfer is automatic. The transfer of %1$s needs to be confirmed by the whole %1$s network.\n2. This address is your only and exclusive transfer address, you can recharge multiple times at the same time, you can also use this address as your payment address in the mine pool.Item \n3. Recharge of assets other than %1$s is prohibited at this address. Any recharge of other assets will not be recovered

"Disclaimer\n1.You are aware of the exchange function we(USDP APP) provides and the consequence it may cause.You will take the full responsibility of using this function\n2.We (USDPAPP) do not take legal responsibility if you as users entered wrong account or amount when confirm the exchange.You as users will take all the responsibility of that consequence."
1USDP=1USD, the amount of assets converted will fluctuate according to the exchange rate between USD and other legal currencies. Please refer to the final amount received.
The quantity issued should be greater than 0

Please copy and paste the keystore to a safe place offline. Do not save it to email, phone note, net disk or messenger, it\'s not safe.
Please do not transfer the keystore through internet. If the keystore is hacked, you may loose all your assets.
If saved online, please use a high security level online password safe such as 1Password to keep the keystore.
